channel.title: PI making npc hit higher (stronger)
channel.description: I'm working on a pi, i added a Deserts treasure (custom) and i can't seem to make any of the npcs stronger. I can't use spawn-config because it spawns by itself. I think it involves npchandler.? pls help?

item.title: PI making npc hit higher (stronger)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640734.msg4317160#msg4317160 date=1371683893]

shank beast:

I’m working on a pi, i added a Deserts treasure (custom) and i can’t seem to make any of the npcs stronger. I can’t use spawn-config because it spawns by itself. I think it involves npchandler.? pls help?

i added this. and i prob did wrong but doesn’t work.
if(newNPC.npcType == 1913) {
newNPC.HP = 230;
newNPC.MaxHP = 230;
newNPC.maxHit = 53;
newNPC.attack = 99;
newNPC.defence = 125;
}

NVM I JUST GOT FUCKED BY NPC LOLOL

Read full topic

item.title: PI making npc hit higher (stronger)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

shank beast:

I’m working on a pi, i added a Deserts treasure (custom) and i can’t seem to make any of the npcs stronger. I can’t use spawn-config because it spawns by itself. I think it involves npchandler.? pls help?

If you use spawn NPC:
public void spawnNpc(Client c, int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int WalkingType, int HP, int maxHit, int attack, int defence, boolean attackPlayer, boolean headIcon) {

You can set a max hit, def, and attack level.

Read full topic
